name: Christopher Crick
content: Christopher Crick Curriculum Vitae Christopher John Crick, PhD Associate Professor Oklahoma State University Computer Science Department 219 MSCS Stillwater OK 74078 (203)907-5734 chriscrick@cs.okstate.edu Research Interests My research agenda is motivated by two overarching, complementary goals: to ground models of developmental psychology and cognitive science in realized, embodied computational systems; and to use models of human cognition and social development to improve robot control and learning, human-robot interaction and artificial intelligence in general. Education Yale University PhD Computer Science, 2009 Dissertation Topic: Inferring Social Roles and Intention from Motion and Interaction Committee: Brian Scassellati, Brian Scholl, Drew McDermott, Benjamin Kuipers MPhil Computer Science MS Computer Science Harvard University MS Computer Science BA History Publications Book Chapters Reza Marzban and Christopher Crick.
